title: LLVM 5.0 Tracking Issue

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

body:
The time has come again, LLVM is releasing 5.0 soon and Rust wants to / needs to follow.

I have started work on the upgrade in these branches:

* `rust-lang/rust`: https://github.com/alexcrichton/rust/tree/llvm50
* `rust-lang/llvm`: https://github.com/rust-lang/llvm/tree/rust-llvm-2017-07-20
* `rust-lang/compiler-rt`: https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-rt/tree/rust-2017-07-20
* `rust-lang-nursery/compiler-builtins`: https://github.com/rust-lang-nursery/compiler-builtins/tree/llvm50

## Open tasks


* [ ] get asm.js working again - reenable `JSBackend` as a target
  * [x] add asm.js target to our fork - https://github.com/rust-lang/llvm/commit/c9a21231adee1733a9ae5b2ba8c15c37576282a5
  * [ ] [update emscripten to LLVM 5.0](https://github.com/kripken/emscripten-fastcomp/issues/193)


## Completed tasks

Next steps:
* [x] Get `rustllvm` to compile ([error log](https://gist.github.com/aabb658aaf2460e94a46630b20e7db81))

Current issues:
* [x] A lot changed around [attributes](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/blob/release_50/include/llvm/IR/Attributes.h) (#43387)
* [x] `SynchronizationScope` [changed / was renamed?](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/commit/8f85685860c0f6018a83b804f33e47f8122a9eba) (#43387)
* [x] `LLVMMetadataRef` was added, this can / should likely replace `LLVMRustMetadataRef` (#43387)
* [x] `createPointerType` [gained a new parameter](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/commit/2cee5cc825969057f8d23b507a4861e606216aed) (#43387)
* [x] `createNameSpace` [lost some parameters](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/commit/841400b968059a98f58ad258552692c7a4bd0bad) (#43387)
* [x] `DebugLoc` was replaced by `DiagnosticLocation` in [LLVM `DiagnosticInfo`](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/commit/787e150ebea15e81dbd497846388c8c5dc855fb6) (#43387)
* [x] compiler segfault when testing in stage2 - using `x86_64-gnu` image
  * [x] [sample backtrace](https://gist.github.com/alexcrichton/9a2135eb5b99f10426cd6e017d7e8597)
  * [x] [upstream bug](https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=33917)
  * [x] upstream fix (~~[temporary workaround](https://github.com/rust-lang/llvm/commit/12eaab5ce9cdeec1431593bb0bb3fb40d1252ff4)~~) - [commit1](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/commit/7313cf88d8717af101e89811a410faf4591f2864), [commit2](https://github.com/llvm-mirror/llvm/commit/bc62a9f5d4a276a5f023e3ebd957b6915f101a3e)
* [x] fix compilation of fuzzer on various platforms
  * [x] [i686 freebsd](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/257578198)
  * [x] [x86_64 freebsd](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/257578208)
  * [x] [x86_64 netbsd](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/257578212)
  * [x] ~~upstream bug~~ [local fix/workaround](https://github.com/alexcrichton/rust/commit/d69bd9257637182a38b00245e73a280578e66dec)
  * [x] ~~upstream fix~~
  * [x] https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/43527
* [x] fix compilation of LLVM on i686-unknown-linux-gnu
  * [x] [logs](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/257578199)
  * [x] ~~upstream bug~~ [local workaround](https://github.com/rust-lang/llvm/commit/dc8abaa3ed2010763e621f8baa1bfda78e4ae2e0)
  * [x] ~~upstream fix~~
* [x] `codegen/issue-37945.rs` - [info below](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/43370#issuecomment-317112605)
  * [x] [upstream bug](https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=33470)
  * [x] [upstream fix](https://reviews.llvm.org/D36590) (~~[ignore it](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/43370#issuecomment-317584088)~~)
* [x] FreeBSD failed to compile `std::to_string` references
  * [x] https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/43530
* [x] fix `run-make/sanitizer-leak` - apparently hit a fatal error when run locally?
  * [x] `--privileged` needed when running the docker container https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/43536
* [x] `run-make/simd-ffi` 
  * [x] [upstream bug](https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=33883)
  * [x] [upstream fix](https://reviews.llvm.org/D35765)
* [x] mips failed to compile cargo
  * [x] [mipsel logs](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/257578203)
  * [x] [mips logs](https://travis-ci.org/rust-lang/rust/jobs/257578200)
  * [x] [upstream bug](https://bugs.llvm.org/show_bug.cgi?id=33978)
  * [x] [upstream fix](https://reviews.llvm.org/D36236)
* [x] related `debuginfo-gdb` test failures - #47610
  * [sample fix](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/43370#issuecomment-317107453)
  * [explanation](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/43370#issuecomment-317111044)
 * [x] rustc with LLVM 5 reports invalid DIExpression (#47464) - fixed in #47610
 * [ ] LLVM 5 fails debuginfo/by-value-self-argument-in-trait-impl.rs (#47611)

All but the first issues seem straight forward to fix, so I'll try to send PRs for those soon.
